feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
